articles.description: The long read: Disney’s new streaming service arrived in the UK just as the coronavirus lockdown kicked in. With so many hours to fill, it seemed like a sensible investment. Pretty soon, it was infiltrating my every waking hour.
articles.content: A few weeks ago, on a day that was probably like today now that the days are all frighteningly different and yet strangely the same, Disney launched Disney+, its new streaming service, in the UK. The precise date, for those that are still tracking such things… [+25067 chars]

articles.title: Brad Pitt does the weather for John Krasinski's Some Good News show - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brad Pitt, 56, did the weather for the latest episode of John Krasinski's Some Good News show. 'We should do a check on the weather. Brad, how's it looking out there?'
articles.content:
Actor, producer, and now weatherman. 
Brad Pitt, 56, did the weather from his house for the latest episode of John Krasinski's Some Good News show. 
'We should do a check on the weather. Brad, how's it looking out there?' John, 40, asked after reporting on … [+2109 chars]

articles.title: The Batman Joins The List Of Movies Being Delayed By Coronavirus - Empire
articles.description: Sopranos prequel The Many Saints Of Newark, and more are on the move. Get the details at Empire.
articles.content: Thanks to the sheer number of movies being delayed because of the coronavirus pandemic and related cinema closures, even movies that seemed to be safely anchored in 2021 release spots are now being shifted as studios alter their plans. The latest high-profile… [+1382 chars]

articles.title: Prince Charles gives hidden nod to bride he walked down the isle in latest video - Express
articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES gave a subtle nod to a special bride he walked down the isle during a video message to open a temporary coronavirus field hospital in Wales.
